thread.section_title: Carvi Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice small hotel
thread.title_full: Nice small hotel - Review of Carvi Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: portuguesas
title: Nice small hotel
text: Our bedroom didn't have windows! I confess that not having natural light was weird, but there was AC (blessed! So important in the summer!), a nice size bedroom, so it was ok. The staff was nice, the location was good, I'd probably go back. There's a Starbucks close by, perfect for breakfast. There was a computer in the reception you could use and a terrace for relaxing on top. However, it's a small building compared to those around, so not much use going up to the roof.
